name: Trinity Ghoul
flavor_text: "I couldn't afford to miss. Not when it was his life on the line." —Marin Mansanas, Tangled Outrider

frame.name: Split Electron
frame.description: Fires an arrow that splits when released. Aiming down sights and fully drawing the bow both decrease the spread.

perks.description:
Tightly strung bow.
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly slower draw time
  •  Slightly decreases stability
perks.name: High Tension String

perks.description:
Thinner arrows to increase nocking speed and weapon handling.
  •  Increases handling speed 
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: Compact Arrow Shaft

perks.description: Precision kills grant the next shot chain-lightning capabilities.
perks.name: Lightning Rod
